overview: The aim of this unit is to describe the design of global atmospheric models as they are used in Numerical Weather Prediction, seasonal prediction and climate simulation. The unit aims to provide a basic understanding of all aspects of global atmospheric modelling. It will describe modelling techniques required to apply the fundamental equations that govern atmospheric flow in the settings of a modern General Circulation Model.
ilo: Explain the basic aspects of atmospheric modelling, including an understanding of how the basic equations are represented in models;
Analyse and plot model output; and
Understand how processes are parameterized within models.
generic_skills: The ability to exercise critical judgement;
Adopted a problem-solving approach to new and unfamiliar tasks; and
Developed high-level written report presentation skills; oral communication and presentation skills.
